Name: The Sunday Session
Instructions:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Cocchi de Torino infused with salted maple walnuts
Mix 250g walnuts, 200ml pure maple syrup and 10g rock salt and leave to soak for 3 hours. Add 500ml Cocchi de Torino, mix and leave to sit in a sealed container for 4 days, shaking each day. Filter with a coffee filter and bottle. Dehydrate the left over walnuts to use for garnish. Special ingredient #2 : Vanilla infused Colombian coffee syrup
History: Created in 2016 by Dominic Willox at Bridge Street Social Club, Aberdeen for Jack Danielâ€™s Tennessee Calling competition.
